name: Scuffle Scoundrels
summary:
Scuffle Scoundrels is a free-for-all arcade brawl, with explosive powerups, hazardous obstacles, and four imposing captains. It is sink or be sunk in this fast paced Pirate romp!



The seas are dangerous, the lesser helmsman may perish
Dance the sargasso dance through the tough seaweeds!
Navigate treacherous minefields, and lure your enemies to an explosive end!
Ride the tide on the rim of the maelstrom, but beware the kraken's jaws!


Will you play as Haima the pirate princess of a once mighty dynasty?
As the mysterious Ngisi seeking powers beyond this realm?
As smarmy Aldha the rich and influential pirate merchant?
Or as the fierce Leowin, renegade admiral, proud and majestic?

Collect chests to load your cannons with deadly powerups
Explosive cannon balls tear through the hulls of rivals with a powerful shockwave!
Rapidfire cannon balls send projectiles hurling through the air at a terrifying pace!
Chainshot cannon balls catch enemies in a wide area and drag them to Davy Jones' locker!
